Sure Jim send it to my email. You have it. As for the ones that got erased =
if the recorder is USB you might be able to use a file recovery program to =
unerase the files. Ive done that on accident with the camera and few other =
things to many times to count LOL and file recovery usually can access it l=
ike a harddrive and unerase them.
=A0
Misty

WAV file so you can receive the most information. In wav format it is 511kb=

 actually says "someone" OR "some woman" said. You can do any enhancements =
that you might think will bring out the audio. If you have time. Thanks. Ji=
m H
